00018 #include "OgrePagingLandScapePrecompiledHeaders.h"

00020 #include "OgrePagingLandScapeSceneManager.h"
00021 #include "OgrePagingLandScapeOptions.h"
00022 #include "OgrePagingLandScapeTextureCoordinatesManager.h"
00023 
00024 namespace Ogre
00025 {
00026         //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00027         PagingLandScapeTextureCoordinatesManager::PagingLandScapeTextureCoordinatesManager(PagingLandScapeSceneManager * scnMgr) :      
00028                 mPageSize (0),
00029         mTileSize (0),
00030                 mOptions (scnMgr->getOptions())
00031         {
00032         }
00033         //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00034         PagingLandScapeTextureCoordinatesManager::~PagingLandScapeTextureCoordinatesManager()
00035         {
00036                 clear();
00037         }
00038         //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00039         void PagingLandScapeTextureCoordinatesManager::clear()
00040         {
00041                 // Unload the Tiles
00042                 if (!mTexBuffs.empty())
00043                 {
00044                         HardwareTextureBuffersCol::iterator iend = mTexBuffs.end();
00045                         for (HardwareTextureBuffersCol::iterator i = mTexBuffs.begin(); 
00046                                 i != iend; 
00047                                 ++i)
00048                         {
00049                                 //         std::for_each(i->begin (), 
00050                                 //                        i->end (),  
00051                                 //                        delete_object());
00052 
00053                                 i->clear();   
00054                         } 
00055                         mTexBuffs.clear();    
00056                 }
00057         }
00058         //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00059         void PagingLandScapeTextureCoordinatesManager::load()
00060         {
00061                 const unsigned int pSize = mOptions->PageSize;
00062                 const unsigned int tSize = mOptions->TileSize;
00063                 if (mPageSize != pSize || 
00064                         mTileSize != tSize)
00065                 {     
00066                         clear();
00067 
00068                         mPageSize = pSize;
00069                         mTileSize = tSize;
00070                         const unsigned int NumTiles = mOptions->NumTiles;
00071 
00072                         mTexBuffs.reserve (NumTiles);
00073                         mTexBuffs.resize (NumTiles);
00074                         for (unsigned int  i = 0; i < NumTiles; ++i)
00075                         {
00076                                 mTexBuffs[i].reserve (NumTiles);
00077                                 mTexBuffs[i].resize (NumTiles);
00078                         }
00079                 }
00080         }
00081         //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00082         HardwareVertexBufferSharedPtr PagingLandScapeTextureCoordinatesManager::getBuffer(
00083                 const unsigned int tilex, 
00084                 const unsigned int tilez)
00085         {
00086                 assert (tilex < mOptions->NumTiles && 
00087                                 tilez < mOptions->NumTiles);
00088 
00089                 if (mTexBuffs [tilex][tilez].isNull ())
00090                 {
00091                         const unsigned int tileSize = mOptions->TileSize;
00092 
00093                         const VertexElementType t = VET_FLOAT2;
00094                         //const VertexElementType t = VET_SHORT2;
00095                         const size_t vertexSize = VertexElement::getTypeSize (t);
00096                         HardwareVertexBufferSharedPtr vbuf = 
00097                                 HardwareBufferManager::getSingleton ().createVertexBuffer(
00098                                                                                                                 vertexSize, 
00099                                                                                                                 tileSize * tileSize,
00100                                                                                                                 HardwareBuffer::HBU_STATIC_WRITE_ONLY);
00101 
00102                         float* pTex = static_cast<float*> (vbuf->lock(HardwareBuffer::HBL_DISCARD));
00103                         //ushort* pSecond = static_cast<ushort*> (vbuf->lock(HardwareBuffer::HBL_DISCARD));
00104 
00105                         // Calculate the offset in the texture position
00106                         const unsigned int offSetX = tilex * (tileSize - 1);
00107                         const unsigned int offSetZ = tilez * (tileSize - 1);
00108                         const unsigned int endx = offSetX + tileSize;
00109                         const unsigned int endz = offSetZ + tileSize;
00110 
00111                         const Real Aux1 =  1.0 / (mOptions->PageSize - 1);
00112                         Real K_Tex2DataPos = offSetZ * Aux1;
00113                         for (unsigned int k = offSetZ; k < endz; k ++)
00114                         {
00115                                 Real K_Tex1DataPos = offSetX * Aux1;
00116                                 for (unsigned int i = offSetX; i < endx; i ++)
00117                                 {
00118                                         // textures
00119                                         //assert (K_Tex1DataPos >= 0.0f && K_Tex1DataPos <= 1.0f);
00120                                         //assert (K_Tex2DataPos >= 0.0f && K_Tex2DataPos <= 1.0f);
00121                                         if (K_Tex1DataPos > 1.0f) K_Tex1DataPos = 1.0f;
00122                                         if (K_Tex2DataPos > 1.0f) K_Tex2DataPos = 1.0f;
00123                                         *pTex++ = K_Tex1DataPos;        
00124                                         *pTex++ = K_Tex2DataPos;
00125 
00126                                         //            *pTex++ = static_cast<ushort> (K_Tex1DataPos * 65535);
00127                                         //            *pTex++ = static_cast<ushort> (K_Tex2DataPos * 65535);
00128 
00129                                         K_Tex1DataPos += Aux1;
00130                                 }
00131                                 K_Tex2DataPos += Aux1;
00132                         }
00133                         vbuf->unlock();         
00134                         mTexBuffs [tilex][tilez] = vbuf;
00135                 }
00136                 return mTexBuffs [tilex][tilez];
00137         }
00138 } //namespace
